pr_title: widget-overlay: make encounter health bar moveable

timeline.message: widget-overlay: make encounter health bar moveable

timeline.bodyText: This should be named COX_BOSS_HEALTH_BAR since it's specific to raids
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: This health bar widget is not unique to raids (Galvek, The Nightmare, Vanstrom Klause). A generic toggle was added in last weeks update so I'd expect Jagex to also use it for other encounters in the future.
replies.author: CopyPastaOSRS

replies.bodyText: Ah I didn't realize it was generic to all of those. Maybe renaming this to be more in line with Jagex's naming then? HEALTH_OVERLAY_BAR?
replies.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: Same here, this should be renamed
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
